logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: While I was at it I also removed some boilerplate comments from Eclipse.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added more Javadoc and fixed existing Javadoc.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added the display of a warning if there are references to the document which is being archived/deleted.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added the functionality to find references to the current document (which can be used to warn a user before deleting or archiving) using the DocumentReferencesHelper helper class.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Moved a lot of functionality into a helper class for easier reuse in other xsps.

logentry.author: edith
logentry.msg: action to test the checkOut of a document

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The code that was commented out is needed when deleting a language version when we need to redirect to another language version of the document (we cannot blindly redirect to the default language as it might have been deleted as well).

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Make sure to check all other files in the live area for links to the current document before deactivating. Issue a warning if any other files do contain references.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The DefaultDocumentIdToPathMapper now also implements the PathToDocumentIdMapper interface, i.e. it can be used to query for a document-id given a file, an area and a publication.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Interface that offers a method to fetch the document-id for a given file (publication and area).

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Adapted to the needs of deactivate in the info area which is only interested if a file contains a certain pattern.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added a method to fetch the content directory.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added the credits section which Nicola has alraedy added to the live site.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added an action that checks for the existence of a document-id in the authoring site tree. This is used in the creation usecase. If a child-id is already taken redirect back to the creation screen and displey an error message.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Instead of having a boolean variable 'insertBefore' there is now a variable 'insertWhere' which can be 'before', 'after' or 'inside'. For the values 'before' and 'after' the tags are added before or after the original tag. For the value inside the new tag is inserted inside the original tag.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Instead of having a boolean variable 'insertBefore' there is now a variable 'insertWhere' which can be 'before', 'after' or 'inside'. This variable is passed to the ant task which acts accordingly.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Use the text-iso-8859-1 serializer when returning the navigation for the info area.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The missing-language screen now allows the user to directly click on one of the available languages. In order to do that the missing-language xsp uses a helper class DocumentLanguagesHelper which can compute an URL given an objectModel and a language.
